install.name: System - OpenID Delegation
install.author: Will Daniels
install.description: Adds OpenID relationship links to the HTML document head to delegate OpenID authentication to the specified server (thus allowing you to use any of your site URLs for OpenID authentication and giving you the freedom to change your OpenID service provider without changing your OpenID).

param.name: openid_link_server
param.label: OpenID Server URL
param.description: Set this to the server URL of your OpenID service (e.g. http://www.myopenid.com)

param.name: openid_link_delegate
param.label: OpenID Delegate URL
param.description: This should be your own OpenID URL that the specified server can authenticate.
